text: Maria (also "Mariya" and "Marina") Leontievna Itkina (; ; 3 May 1932 - 1 December 2020) was a Soviet runner. She set multiple world records in many sprint events. She competed at the 1956 and 1960 and 1964 Olympics and finished four times in fourth place. Itkina held 17 Soviet sprint titles. Itkina died in Minsk, Belarus on 1 December 2020 at the age of 88.На 89-м году жизни скончалась легендарная бегунья Мария Иткина ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet sprinters
title: Maria Itkina
